Flow.description: Actions related to the Opportunity Object - updated after TF and DCC cleanup

value.stringValue: AND( TEXT([Opportunity].Approval_Status__c) = 'Approved', [Opportunity].Fees_Require_Approval__c = True, ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Fees_Require_Approval__c), TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) <> 'Contract Signed', $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Finance Approver" )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_18
formulas.expression: AND( TEXT({!myVariable_current.Approval_Status__c}) = 'Approved', {!myVariable_current.Fees_Require_Approval__c} = True, ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Fees_Require_Approval__c}), TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) <> 'Contract Signed', {!$Profile.Name} <> "System Administrator", {!$Profile.Name} <> "Finance Approver" )

Flow.label: Opportunity - On Create & Edit
